total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the numbers in the input grid.

Q1: Identify the pattern of the input grid. The pattern seems to be a series of rows with a specific color (represented by a number), separated by rows of zeros, and a column of 4s.
Q2: Identify the transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples. The transformation seems to be a rotation of the grid 90 degrees counterclockwise.
Q3: Identify the color rows in the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Apply the transformation (rotation 90 degrees counterclockwise) to the identified color rows in the quiz input grid.
